alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Cumberland; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 10:47PM EST until December 21 at 9:40PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Vermont...New Hampshire...Maine... Connecticut River Near Dalton affecting Caledonia, Grafton, Essex and Coos Counties. Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Kennebec and Somerset Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire...Maine... Androscoggin River At Gorham affecting Oxford and Coos Counties. Androscoggin River Near Auburn affecting Androscoggin, Cumberland and Sagadahoc Counties. Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Kennebec and Sagadahoc Counties. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. Lamprey River Near Newmarket affecting Strafford and Rockingham Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Androscoggin River near Auburn. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.5 feet, The parking lot behind Roak Block on Main Street in Auburn floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 15.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 PM EST Wednesday was 20.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 8.9 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
